text: Kunjikuruvi is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Vinayan. The film stars Nedumudi Venu and Geetha in lead roles. The film had musical score by Mohan Sithara. ==Cast== *Nedumudi Venu *Geetha ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films Category:Films directed by Vinayan
title: Kunjikuruvi
